mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_picture, post_text, post_grade, user_id, reservation_id, lodging_id, room_id) VALUES (#{postPicture}, #{postText}, #{postGrade}, #{userId}, #{reservationId}, #{lodgingId}, #{roomId})
mapper.sql: SELECT p.post_id , p.post_picture , p.post_text , p.post_grade , u.user_id , re.reservation_id , l.lodging_id , ro.room_id FROM post p, user u, reservation re, lodging l, room ro WHERE p.user_id = u.user_id AND p.reservation_id = re.reservation_id AND l.lodging_id = ro.lodging_id AND p.room_id = ro.room_id
